sentence: This is a very good Courtyard good pool and facilities with good helpful staff who go out of their way to help
Great spot for beach or pool
The views are great pool bar restaurants are very good
good pool and hot tub
The hotel had a very nice pool area however and it provided for a comfortable hang out
The pool is pretty and the hot tub was always the place to hang out day or night
The resort grounds feel very private and exclusive featuring its own beach though not one for safe swimming and a very nice pool area and spa
Enjoyed live music and dessert one night near the pool
Our room faced the pool and we really enjoyed the beautiful beachfront sunrises soft afternoon breezes and occasional quick rain showers that gave way to quiet sunsets
Good location close to north and southshore pool area quiet nice beach view a blast rooms ok need an upgrade bedding good the roosters al over get you up early but it ’s an island thing food ok
The lobby and pool ARE undergoing major renovations but our room was perfect
Chairs Lounges set up along the beach it is a lovely beach to look at but not good for swimming
Sure you can use the neighboring pool but you need to walk half a mile to it
You get to use the pool at the hotel next door and you can make an appointment for the two hour increment you and your family will use the pool
I did not know it is under remodeling without the pool which explains the 3 stars otherwise it will be up to 45
The property was under renovation the courtyard and swimming pool was under construction
There was construction going on and the pool was not usable but the rooms were beautiful the food and bar were great and the construction hours on the pool was reasonable
We were told it was a 5 min walk along the beach we could drive or they would shuttle us to the property so we could swim
When it is finished the pool area will be beautiful
The rooms were nicely renovated but the pool area was closed which the website did NOT say it stated the property was renovating but not pool specific which is the main amenity I like to use

First time to Kauai here for Honeymoon that was booked first of the year with no mention of the construction on the pool area or lack of a real restaurant not just bar food breakfast was good though and great staff
the beach is beautiful but a little small and not a swimming beach because of reefs and turbulent waves and current
Our Ocean view room was technically correct however it was more like a pool view with the ocean beyond it
towels always empty in pool area pool service very slow and breakfast took 15 minutes to get coffee
If you check 5 times and if you are lucky you will find beach towels once at the swimming pool
Only down side is do n’t expect to swim in the beach
The tiles around the pool the breakfast restaurant and the lobby was quite slippery
The beach is windy the pool side is windy as well you can not find a place to avoid it no matter where you go
The fire pits around the pool are lovely in the evening but again with so much wind is hard to enjoy even a single drink
The outdoor pool that gives an infinity feel is perfect facing the choppy ocean waves
